short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens Make.com scenarios in the current folder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Folder - Scenario Creator streamlines your Make.com workflow by enabling quick scenario creation and folder navigation. While viewing any folder or scenario in Make.com, easily create new scenarios in the current folder or open the folder view with a single click.
Key features:

Creates scenarios in current folder context
Opens folder views in new windows
Works across all Make.com instances (eu1, eu2, us1, etc.)
Preserves folder organization while building
Simple, clean interface
Zero configuration needed

Perfect for Make.com users who frequently create scenarios and want to maintain organized folder structures while building automations.

NOTE: This solution is not an official Make.com solution and has not been approved or sanctioned by them in any way.
